subject: Re: newb question - could not find class
msgSnippet: Here s what I did wrong:  The README clearly says not to put junit-4.1.jar in the extensions directory. But did I pay attention to this?  No I did not.
messageBody:
Here's what I did wrong: The README clearly says not to put junit-4.1.jar in the extensions
directory.

But did I pay attention to this? No I did not. Consequently, the classloader for extension jars
couldn't find the test class files on the CLASSPATH.

This Tracker item on Sourceforge clearly describes the workaround:
http://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?
func=detail&aid=1526798&group_id=15278&atid=365278
